column2: "Hey, <%me>, perfect timing. Do you mind joining me on a request?"
"You know the Tunnels on Lillipa? It's pretty much unexplored, so it attracts all sorts of people trying to make a name for themselves."
"But some of them end up getting in over their heads. I'll be headed there on a rescue mission soon."
"Of course, there's a reward involved, as always. So what do you say? Shall we go save some lives?"
